alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 4:15PM CDT until April 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WEBSTER...NORTHWESTERN DOUGLAS...NORTHWESTERN TANEY...EASTERN CHRISTIAN AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 414 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Highlandville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ozark, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Rogersville, Sparta, Fordland, Oldfield, Elkhead, Chestnutridge, Bruner, Selmore, Keltner, Christian Center, Chadwick, Linden and Dogwood. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
